mapper.sql: id, pay_order_no, pre_pay_id, user_ip, error_code, error_msg, pay_amount, expire_time, state, ship_name, ship_phone, remark, um_user_id, pay_time, start_time, close_time, create_time, update_time
mapper.update: UPDATE om_order oo INNER JOIN om_ticket_temp ott ON ott.order_id = oo.id AND ott.scene_id = #{omTicketSceneId} SET oo.update_time = NOW(), oo.state = 4
mapper.select: SELECT EXISTS ( SELECT oo.`id` FROM om_order oo INNER JOIN om_ticket_temp ott ON ott.order_id = oo.id WHERE ott.ticket_id = 1 AND (oo.state = 3 OR oo.state = 4) ) AS temp

SELECT osrg.ticket_id, osrg.id as relId, osrg.scene_id, osrg.grade_id, ot.`name`, ot.`picture`, ots.`name` AS sceneName, ots.`start_time`, otg.`name` AS gradeName, otg.`sell_price`, osrg.remaining_sum FROM om_scene_rel_grade osrg INNER JOIN om_ticket ot ON ot.id = osrg.ticket_id AND osrg.id = #{relId} INNER JOIN om_ticket_scene ots ON ots.`id` = osrg.scene_id INNER JOIN om_ticket_grade otg ON otg.`id` = osrg.grade_id

SELECT oo.id as orderId, oo.state AS orderState, oo.pay_amount, ott.ticket_name, ott.start_time, ott.scene_name, ott.grade_name, ott.order_num, ot.`addr_detail` FROM om_order oo INNER JOIN om_ticket_temp ott ON ott.order_id = oo.id INNER JOIN om_ticket ot ON ot.id = ott.ticket_id
oo.del_flag = 0
and oo.um_user_id = #{userId}
and oo.state = 1
and oo.state = 3
and oo.state = 4

SELECT oo.state AS orderState, uu.phone, uu.nick_name, oo.ticket_no, ott.order_num, ott.`picture`, ott.`ticket_name`, ott.start_time, ott.scene_name, ott.`addr_detail`, ott.grade_name, oo.pay_amount, oo.id AS orderId, oo.create_time, oo.pay_time, oo.refund_time, (CASE WHEN oo.state = 1 THEN oo.expire_time ELSE NULL END) as expireTime, oors.seat_str FROM om_order oo INNER JOIN um_user uu ON oo.um_user_id = uu.id AND oo.id = #{orderId} INNER JOIN om_ticket_temp ott ON ott.order_id = oo.id LEFT JOIN om_order_rel_seat oors ON oo.id = oors.order_id ORDER BY oors.id ASC
